answers.answer: The risk are that your scare tissue can rip. Research all you can. It's a personal choice. I am trying for a vbac this time. I don't want to.face another c-section if possible. Good luck.

question: Vaginal birth after cesarean is what it's called.. So I have had a cesarean my first pregnancy, with a set of twins due to preeclampsia, this time my doctor told me I should be able to do a vaginal birth, what are the risks for those who know.. I don't like cesarean even though I healed quickly, but I can't even.cough, laugh, pass gas, walk up the steps or nothing after a cesarean
title: vbac
